title: Theme development in movement education (TEFC)
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Physical education and training - Study and teaching
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Activity programs in education
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Physical education for children

Hobbies, Recreation & Sport/Physical education for children
description: Episode number 4 of Series "Movement Education". Begins with a brief explanation of how to plan a short theme in a progressive and systematic way. In the second part, an extended theme of matching shapes is developed with a fourth grade class through a series of nine lessons. Shows excellent use of small and large equipment
